org.dsa.iot.commons

Class ParameterizedAction.ParameterInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dsa.iot.dslink.node.actions.Parameter
      • org.dsa.iot.commons.ParameterizedAction.ParameterInfo
  • Enclosing class:
    ParameterizedAction

    public static class ParameterizedAction.ParameterInfo
extends Parameter
    A special type of parameter that contains extra information as to how the parameter should behave when being validated.

      • setPersistent

        public void setPersistent(boolean persist)
        Before the action is invoked, the persistence values will be configured and validated. This will ensure the parameters always have the correct default values.
        Parameters:
        persist - Whether this parameter is persistent.

      • persist

        public boolean persist()
        Returns:
        Whether this parameter is persistent.
